abstract: Mr. Woolery, a co-founder of the activist fund, resigned for “personal reasons,” the firm said.
snippet: Mr. Woolery, a co-founder of the activist fund, resigned for “personal reasons,” the firm said.
lead_paragraph: The veteran deal maker James C. Woolery has left Hudson Executive Capital, the activist hedge fund he co-founded, the firm said on Monday.

headline.main: James C. Woolery Leaves Hudson Executive Capital Hedge Fund
headline.print_headline: Deal Maker Steps Down From Fund He Launched

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
